headline: Samsung in Talks to Buy FläktGroup in $1.5 Billion-Plus Deal
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Samsung Electronics Co. is closing in on an agreement to buy FläktGroup Holding GmbH, acquiring the European heating and cooling specialist in its biggest overseas takeover in eight years.Most Read from BloombergA New Central Park Amenity, Tailored to Its East Harlem NeighborsWhat’s Behind the Rise in Serious Injuries on New York City’s Streets?NYC Warns of 17% Drop in Foreign Tourists Due to Trump PoliciesLA Mayor Credits Trump on Fire Aid, Stays Wary on ImmigrationLawsuit Challe
